title: Surprising Survey Reveals: One in Three Australians See Positive Crypto Impact from Trump
body: Is Donald Trump secretly a crypto bull? While the former US President’s stance on digital currencies has been… let’s say, dynamic , a recent survey from down under has unearthed a rather surprising perspective. It appears a significant chunk of Australians believe ‘The Donald’ is actually good news for the crypto world. Let’s dive into this fascinating Aussie crypto sentiment and unpack what it all means. Decoding the Australian Crypto Survey: Trump’s Crypto Influence Independent Reserve, a well-known crypto exchange in Australia, recently polled 2,100 Australian adults to gauge their views on various crypto-related topics. Among the intriguing findings was the perception of Donald Trump’s impact on the cryptocurrency landscape. Cointelegraph reported that the survey highlighted that nearly one-third of Australians – a solid 31% – perceive Trump’s influence on crypto as positive. Now, before you picture kangaroos stacking sats, it’s important to understand the nuances. A significant majority, around 60%, opted for a neutral stance, suggesting either indifference or perhaps a ‘wait-and-see’ approach regarding Trump’s crypto dealings. On the other end of the spectrum, only a small 8% viewed his impact negatively. This paints a picture of cautious optimism, or at least, not outright pessimism, when it comes to Trump and crypto in the Australian context. Crypto Investor Sentiment vs. Mainstream Views Here’s where things get even more interesting. The survey data reveals a stark contrast between crypto investors and those who are not yet in the crypto game. It turns out that crypto investors in Australia are considerably more bullish on Trump’s crypto effect. A noteworthy 50% of crypto investors surveyed believe Trump’s influence is positive. That’s a whole half! This strongly suggests that those already invested in digital assets are more inclined to see Trump as a potential ally or catalyst for the crypto market. Conversely, among non-crypto investors, the positive sentiment towards Trump’s crypto impact is considerably lower, at just 20%. This disparity highlights a potential knowledge gap or difference in perspective between those actively involved in crypto and the general public. It could also indicate that crypto investors are more attuned to, or perhaps more hopeful about, any external factors that could positively influence the value and adoption of digital currencies. Let’s break down the numbers for clarity: Overall Australian Adults: Positive view of Trump’s crypto impact: 31% Neutral view: ~60% Negative view: 8% Crypto Investors: Positive view of Trump’s crypto impact: 50% Non-Crypto Investors: Positive view of Trump’s crypto impact: 20% Why the Positive Crypto Market Sentiment Towards Trump? So, why are some Australians, particularly crypto investors, seeing Trump as a positive force for crypto? While the survey doesn’t delve into the ‘why,’ we can speculate on a few potential reasons based on Trump’s general political and economic stances, and how they might be interpreted within the crypto community: Deregulation Advocate: Trump’s broader political ideology often leans towards deregulation. Crypto enthusiasts might interpret this as a potential for a less restrictive regulatory environment for digital currencies in the US, which could have global ripple effects, including in Australia. Market Volatility = Opportunity: Trump’s presidency was often characterized by market volatility. While volatility can be risky, many crypto traders thrive in volatile markets, seeing it as an opportunity for profit. Therefore, some might view Trump’s potential return to power as a catalyst for increased market activity and potential gains in the crypto space. Anti-Establishment Figure: Cryptocurrencies, at their core, often represent a challenge to traditional financial systems and institutions. Trump, as a political outsider and anti-establishment figure, might resonate with some crypto proponents who see him as someone who disrupts the status quo, potentially benefiting decentralized finance. Geopolitical Uncertainty: Global political and economic uncertainty can sometimes drive investors towards alternative assets like Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Trump’s policies and pronouncements often introduced an element of unpredictability, which, paradoxically, could be seen as positive for the crypto market by some seeking safe havens or uncorrelated assets. Is This a Global Trend in Crypto Investor Sentiment? While this survey is specific to Australia, it begs the question: is this positive sentiment towards Trump’s crypto influence a broader global trend among crypto investors? It’s difficult to say definitively without similar surveys conducted in other countries. However, it’s plausible that similar sentiments might exist in other parts of the world, particularly among those who share the perspectives outlined above regarding deregulation, market volatility, and anti-establishment views. Further research and surveys across different regions would be needed to ascertain whether this Australian finding is an isolated case or part of a larger global trend in crypto investor sentiment regarding political figures and their potential impact on the digital asset space. It’s certainly a fascinating area to watch as the intersection of politics and cryptocurrency continues to evolve. Actionable Insights for Crypto Enthusiasts So, what can crypto enthusiasts and investors take away from this survey? Here are a few actionable insights: Stay Informed on Global Political Developments: This survey underscores the fact that global political events and figures can indeed influence the cryptocurrency market. Keeping abreast of political developments, particularly in major economies like the US, is crucial for crypto investors. Consider Diverse Perspectives: Understanding how different segments of the population (like crypto investors vs. non-investors) perceive external factors can provide valuable insights into potential market movements and sentiment shifts. Do Your Own Research (DYOR): While surveys provide interesting data points, always conduct your own thorough research before making any investment decisions based on political opinions or survey results. Understand the potential risks and rewards associated with any crypto investment. Engage in Crypto Community Discussions: Discussing these findings and their implications within the crypto community can lead to a richer understanding of the various factors influencing the market and help refine your own investment strategies. Conclusion: Decoding the Trump Crypto Puzzle The Australian survey offers a compelling glimpse into the complex relationship between political figures and the cryptocurrency market. The fact that a significant portion of Australians, and especially crypto investors, view Donald Trump as a positive influence on crypto is a noteworthy finding. Whether this perception is accurate or will translate into tangible market effects remains to be seen. However, it highlights the increasing interconnectedness of the political and crypto spheres and underscores the importance of considering a wide range of factors when navigating the dynamic world of digital currencies. As the crypto landscape continues to mature, understanding these nuanced perspectives will be crucial for both investors and observers alike. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Pyth Network Gears Up for Major Growth: Coinbase to List $PYTH and Grayscale Launches Institutional Fund
body: Pyth Network, a powerful oracle protocol on Solana , might be on the verge of undeniable growth and expansion. Why? Well, first of all, there’s the matter of getting your token into the hands of as many relevant parties as possible, and one way to do that is to list the token for trading on a popular exchange. Coinbase, for instance, is a very popular exchange. And guess what? Coinbase is set to list the Pyth token ($PYTH) for spot trading on February 20th, 2023—so right around the same time you’re reading this. Day 5 of posting 3 random things about @PythNetwork that you might or might not know – within the past 7 days, $pyth got listed on Robinhood, Grayscale launched PYTH Trust and Coinbase is expected to list $pyth for spot trading today Feb 20th 9 am pst – there are currently 110+… — Planck (@hopheycaptain) February 20, 2025 The drama surrounding Solana’s memecoin market has threatened to cast shade on Pyth, but Pyth is still there. Pyth is and continues to be a crucial, major infrastructure provider for decentralized finance. It serves off-chain data for smart contracts. The protocol’s integration into major platforms like Coinbase and Grayscale makes it an infrastructure provider even my mom could understand. Because who doesn’t understand Coinbase and Grayscale? And if Pyth is broadcasting off-chain data to these two heavyweights, well then, Pyth’s got to be doing something right, no? Coinbase and Grayscale: Two Major Moves in One Week Pyth Network has received a major boost with the announcement from Coinbase that it will begin supporting $PYTH for spot trading on its platform. This listing will come into effect on February 20th, 2025, at 9 a.m. PST. For a long time now, people have been expecting $PYTH to be listed on a major exchange, and this is a development we naturally welcome because Coinbase is one of the world’s most prominent crypto exchanges. Now, we look ahead. Increased liquidity, wider accessibility, and an immediate uptick in trading volumes seem to be in the plans for $PYTH. Coinbase will add support for Pyth Network (PYTH) on the Solana network (SPL token). Do not send this asset over other networks or your funds may be lost. Transfers for this asset are available on @Coinbase & @CoinbaseExch in the regions where trading is supported. — Coinbase Assets (@CoinbaseAssets) February 19, 2025 In parallel to Coinbase’s announcement, Grayscale, a preeminent digital asset management firm, has debuted an institutional fund centered on the $PYTH token. The debut of the PYTH Trust not only reinforces the token’s legitimacy but also creates an avenue for institutional investors to access the Pyth Network (which underlies $PYTH). Grayscale’s selection of $PYTH for this Trust is a testament to the burgeoning confidence that both it and the market at large express in the Pyth Network’s prospects. Hearing two peals—the listing of $PYTH on Coinbase and the establishment of the PYTH Trust at Grayscale—serves to underscore the rapidly growing recognition that the Pyth Network enjoys in both retail and institutional circles. The Importance of Pyth Network and Its Role in the Solana Ecosystem The Pyth Network is the leading oracle protocol for the Solana blockchain, supplying vital off-chain data feeds to decentralized finance projects and applications on Solana. Oracles are such a fundamental piece of the decentralized puzzle that making them reliable is one of the best ways to ensure that smart decentralized applications will perform as expected. And Pyth is kind of like the KGB in a Cold War scenario. It has eyes and ears out in the world, but it doesn’t always do its job in a way that’s friendly to decentralized finance. That’s because Pyth provides off-chain data feeds to on-chain contracts with something like 99% reliability. And if you don’t trust Pyth, you might not want to use the applications that are built on top of the proficient oracle it is. Pyth, the leading oracle protocol on Solana, has powered the growth of the Solana DeFi ecosystem by providing the data infrastructure necessary to drive a wide array of applications. In fact, the protocol’s data feeds are trusted by many DeFi projects on Solana, which makes Pyth a pretty integral player in the larger ecosystem. That said, while Pyth’s recent push to expand off of Solana and onto other chains promises to open up a whole new world for the protocol, it faces some serious challenges that threaten key aspects of its value. Despite its trustworthiness, Pyth is not yet premier in the oracle space, which raises some questions about the protocol’s recent overtures to big-name DeFi projects. And then there’s the Solana situation. Still, Pyth has a solid future, boosted by its collaborations and important developments of late. The two events—the listing on Coinbase and the advent of the Grayscale fund—are clear indicators of Pyth’s burgeoning relevance in the crypto sector. Recent Developments and Their Impact on $PYTH’s Price In the last week, a string of essential events surrounding $PYTH has captured the interest of retail and institutional investors. The token’s recent listing on Robinhood, an expanding trading platform that has opened up the world of cryptocurrency to a much wider audience, was perhaps the most attention-grabbing development. $PYTH is now easily tradeable by virtually anyone with a mobile phone—just alongside Venus, Sol, and the Gorga. These key developments mean that $PYTH has attracted much attention from a large number of players, including traders, institutions, and retail investors. The upcoming listing on Coinbase, the conversion from Grayscale to an ETF, and the recent listing on Robinhood give $PYTH an unprecedented level of visibility. This visibility could serve as a driver for what crypto people like to call “tokenomics”—that is, the economy of the token—meaning this visibility could lead to price appreciation and a deeper level of adoption. It is essential to note, however, that $PYTH’s ascent has encountered some bumps. The memecoin drama surrounding Solana has, for a time, pulled Pyth into the limelight of Twitter news cycles. The price of the underlying tokens issued by the Pyth Network has, at times and in some moments, been quite volatile, leading to the price of $PYTH itself becoming somewhat of a roller coaster. Grayscale has launched a $PYTH institutional fund PYTH is the biggest oracle protocol on Solana and is currently down due to SOL memecoins drama. From the price structure, PYTH looks very close to a bottom, which could be around $0.15-$0.17 After that, the next rally will… pic.twitter.com/QOA7rzm4d1 — AMCrypto (@AMCryptoAlex) February 19, 2025 Nevertheless, with the backing of Coinbase, Grayscale, and the other not-too-shabby institutional partners that frequently support crypto ventures, $PYTH appears to be well-positioned for growth over the long haul, no matter how parts of the market play out. What’s Next for Pyth Network? When we look to the future, Pyth Network’s seems to be a very bright one, as it moves ahead to expand its role within both the Solana ecosystem and the wider DeFi landscape. With support from major players like Coinbase and Grayscale, Pyth Network is positioned quite well to lead the oracle space—not only on Solana but also across other blockchain networks. The protocol is set up in such a way that allows it to provide high-quality, real-time data to DeFi applications that makes the network essentially indispensable to the burgeoning decentralized finance industry. The latest progress for $PYTH investors indicates a solid prospect for the token to gain both in price and in market acceptance. Partnerships are a necessity for an oracle protocol, and Pyth Network has in a very short time built an impressive list of partners, consisting of many major players in the blockchain space. If Pyth Network continues on its current trajectory, it is likely to be a very strong player in the industry. As we head into 2025, Pyth Network will be in the spotlight as it tackles the challenges and opportunities in front of it. The listing on Coinbase, the fund run by Grayscale for institutions, and the burgeoning presence of Pyth across the DeFi space all ensure that $PYTH will remain a prominent asset in the near term. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. title: Urgent Warning: Bitcoin ETF Outflows Hit $364.7M – 3rd Day of Net Exits!
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The U.S. spot Bitcoin ETF market is sending some shockwaves. After a period of significant inflows and market excitement, we’re now seeing a notable shift. For the third consecutive day, these much-anticipated investment vehicles have experienced net outflows, totaling a substantial $364.7 million on February 20th alone, according to data from Trader T’s X account and Farside Investors. Is this a temporary blip, or a sign of deeper market currents? Let’s dive into the details and analyze what this could mean for the future of Bitcoin and the broader crypto landscape. Decoding the Bitcoin ETF Outflows: What’s Happening? To understand the magnitude of this shift, let’s break down where these Bitcoin ETF outflows are originating. It’s not just one ETF experiencing this trend; it’s a collective movement across several major players in the spot Bitcoin ETF arena. Here’s a snapshot of the ETF-specific data: ETF Provider ETF Ticker Net Outflow/Inflow (USD Million) BlackRock IBIT -$111.88 ARK Invest ARKB -$98.3 Fidelity FBTC -$88.2 Grayscale GBTC -$33.5 Grayscale BTC -$61.1 Bitwise BITB +$24.1 VanEck HODL +$4.2 Other ETFs – $0.0 As you can see, while Bitwise’s BITB and VanEck’s HODL managed to attract inflows, the significant outflows from giants like BlackRock, ARK Invest, and Fidelity, coupled with continued exits from Grayscale’s GBTC, heavily outweigh these positive figures. This results in the substantial net outflow of $364.7 million. Why are Spot Bitcoin ETFs Seeing Outflows Now? The million-dollar question is: why the sudden change in sentiment? After the initial euphoria surrounding the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S., several factors could be contributing to these outflows: Profit Taking: Bitcoin has experienced a remarkable price surge in recent times. Investors who bought into Bitcoin or Bitcoin ETFs earlier may be taking profits off the table, leading to selling pressure and outflows. Market Correction: The crypto market is known for its volatility. These outflows could be part of a broader market correction, with investors de-risking their portfolios amidst uncertainty or anticipating a potential pullback in Bitcoin’s price. Grayscale GBTC Dynamics: GBTC, converted from a trust to an ETF, has been consistently seeing outflows since its conversion. This is partly attributed to investors moving to ETFs with lower fees and also investors who were previously locked in being able to redeem their shares. The continued outflows from GBTC are a significant contributor to the overall net outflow figures. Macroeconomic Factors: Broader economic conditions, including inflation concerns, interest rate hikes, and geopolitical events, can influence investor sentiment and risk appetite. Uncertainty in the global economy could be prompting some investors to reduce their exposure to riskier assets like Bitcoin. Rotation into Other Assets: It’s also possible that investors are reallocating capital to other asset classes, including other cryptocurrencies, traditional stocks, or bonds, depending on their investment strategies and market outlook. Impact of Crypto ETF Outflows on Bitcoin Price Crypto ETF outflows , particularly when sustained over multiple days, can exert downward pressure on the price of Bitcoin. ETFs hold actual Bitcoin to back their shares. When there are net outflows, ETF providers need to sell Bitcoin to meet redemption requests, increasing supply in the market. Conversely, net inflows create buying pressure. While a few days of outflows don’t necessarily signal a long-term bearish trend, it’s crucial to monitor if this becomes a sustained pattern. Consistent outflows could indicate weakening institutional demand and potentially contribute to a price correction. However, it’s important to remember that the ETF market is still relatively new, and daily fluctuations are expected. Long-term trends and overall investor sentiment are more critical indicators. Are ETF Outflows a Reason to Panic? Not necessarily. While three consecutive days of ETF outflows is noteworthy, it’s essential to keep this in perspective: Early Stages: Spot Bitcoin ETFs are still in their early adoption phase. Market dynamics are still being established, and volatility in flows is expected. Context of Massive Inflows: Prior to these outflows, these ETFs experienced massive inflows, indicating strong initial institutional and retail interest in accessing Bitcoin through regulated investment products. Long-Term Outlook: The fundamental thesis for Bitcoin and its potential as a store of value and alternative asset remains unchanged. Short-term fluctuations in ETF flows shouldn’t overshadow the long-term growth potential of the crypto market. Individual ETF Performance: Note that not all ETFs are experiencing outflows. Bitwise and VanEck, for example, saw inflows, suggesting that investor preferences and fund-specific factors also play a role. Actionable Insights: Navigating Bitcoin ETF Outflows So, what should investors do amidst these ETF outflows ? Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close eye on daily ETF flow data from reputable sources like Farside Investors and analysts like Trader T. Understanding the trends is crucial. Zoom Out: Don’t get overly fixated on short-term fluctuations. Consider the broader market context, long-term Bitcoin fundamentals, and your own investment horizon. Diversification: Diversification remains key in any investment portfolio, especially in the volatile crypto market. Don’t put all your eggs in one basket. Risk Management: Assess your risk tolerance and adjust your portfolio accordingly. If you are uncomfortable with short-term volatility, consider reducing your exposure to Bitcoin or crypto assets. Seek Professional Advice: If you are unsure about how to navigate these market dynamics, consult with a qualified financial advisor who can provide personalized guidance based on your individual circumstances and investment goals. Conclusion: Caution and Vigilance in the Bitcoin ETF Market The recent Bitcoin ETF outflows serve as a reminder that the crypto market, even with the introduction of regulated investment products, remains dynamic and subject to shifts in investor sentiment. While these outflows are a development to watch closely, they don’t necessarily signal an end to the Bitcoin ETF story. Instead, they highlight the importance of vigilance, informed decision-making, and a balanced perspective in navigating the exciting yet often unpredictable world of cryptocurrency investments. Keep your finger on the pulse, stay informed, and remember that long-term trends often outweigh short-term noise. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: $LIBRA’s Dramatic Plunge Costs Traders $251M Amid Argentina Scandal
body: The weekend brought considerable turbulence to the cryptocurrency market, with $LIBRA , the native token of the well-known decentralized project, crashing in price—and crashing hard. The price plunge left investors holding $LIBRA with a breathtaking $251 million less than they had before the price dive. Nansen, a crypto analytics platform, reported that the price plunge affected an overwhelming 86% of traders. They, too, are now counting the losses from this net negative wealth creation event that has drained quite a bit of liquidity from the crypto market. The ongoing scandal concerning $LIBRA’s connections to Argentina was linked to the token’s sudden plummeting price. This has mixed investors with fear and uncertainty, and the situation has been worsened by general market volatility. But while all this seems to have left the $LIBRA trade in a pretty dismal state, with almost all traders who engaged with it between February 16 and 18 now sitting on net losses, there nonetheless appear to be some bright spots where a few traders have managed to yield profits. A Harsh Reality for $LIBRA Traders The latest data from Nansen shows that $LIBRA’s price drop affected its holders severely, resulting in a $251 million loss. Eighty-six percent of traders lost money, and many suffered significant hits to their portfolios because of $LIBRA’s sharp and sudden decline. Conversely, the 14% of traders who were profitable during this time earned a collective $180 million—less than what the majority lost. If nothing else, this divergence of outcomes highlights how devastating the impacts of $LIBRA’s price drop really were. 86% of $LIBRA Traders Lost a Total of $251M Amid Argentina Scandal According to @nansen_ai , last weekend’s $LIBRA plunge wiped out over $250M from investors. Key data: 86% of traders lost a total of $251M Profitable traders only gained $180M $LIBRA became a "net… pic.twitter.com/Tf1Mr0u5Fv — Followin (@followin_io) February 20, 2025 The $LIBRA crash, for many traders, was a “net negative wealth creation” effect. This means that the overall market value was depleted, losses far outweighed any gains, and more wealth was destroyed than created. The weekend’s wild swings in value, which pushed $LIBRA from about $228 on Friday to $126 by Monday morning, were the result, at least in part, of some very external events. These included a widely publicized hearing in Washington, D.C., where Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and other top U.S. financial regulators came before Congress to discuss the Libra situation. This situation has also led to worries about the liquidity of the larger market. When a significant number of traders take big hits and in a very short time, it tends to dent overall market confidence. That seems to be the case right now—in crypto and perhaps extending to the broader market. If you look at a chart of major asset price movements over the past month or so, they all seem to have the same pattern: a sharp drop followed by a lack of liquidity to sustain any kind of upward movement. Argentina Scandal: The Catalyst for $LIBRA’s Fall? The dramatic price movement of $LIBRA can be ascribed to a number of factors, but the catalyst seems to be the ongoing scandal regarding the token’s connection to Argentina. It has been reported that the project is being looked at very closely for its part in some questionable financial dealings in that country, and this is creating a lot of investor uncertainty. So much, in fact, that selling panics are appearing in the market, where traders are trying to exit the situation as quickly as possible before it has a chance to get any worse. This has left many questioning the stability and long-term viability of $LIBRA. The token, which had gained popularity for its decentralized and innovative nature, now faces some serious reputational damage that will take a while to recover from. As the amount of the weekend’s losses continues setting in, investors are reassessing the situation. Many are now deciding whether to hold or abandon their holdings and take what’s left in cash. The crash’s timing couldn’t have been worse for holders of LIBRA, as the market already faced broader macroeconomic uncertainties. Internal project difficulties, such as the Argentina scandal, combined with external fluctuations in the overall crypto space to produce a perfect storm that saw LIBRA lose considerable value in a very short time. The Road Ahead for $LIBRA and Its Traders Following the crash, $LIBRA traders are now dealing with the financial fallout and the uncertainty of what comes next. Some traders hope the project can recover and regain its prior momentum. Others, however, are questioning the cost of the recent Argentina scandal to the token’s “brand.” The heavy losses suffered by so many traders are already impacting the token’s liquidity in the marketplace—making it all the more difficult for new $LIBRA investors to join the party without running into substantial risk. For the developers of $LIBRA, the current situation demands a remobilization of efforts to shore up the project’s reputation. A focus on not just the community’s but also the Project’s now seemed necessary. Two opportunities presented themselves: one in Argentina itself and the other in the U.S.-based community. The work of this week was thought to be essential for both opportunities—to begin some damage control and try to get the Project on a path toward rebuilding its reputation. Meanwhile, the price of $LIBRA is probably going to stay volatile, with traders and investors keeping a close eye on any developments associated with the project’s connections to Argentina. While some may view this as a potential buying opportunity to pick up the dip, others will likely stay on the sidelines until the project offers clearer signs of recovery. Conclusion: The Dark Side of Cryptocurrency Volatility The huge losses suffered by $LIBRA traders remind us of the risks we take when investing in the world of cryptocurrencies, which are anything but stable. Certainly, there are high rewards to be had; however, we could just as easily be facing massive losses on projects that are already turning sour due to sensational headlines and are under threat from potential lawsuits and much closer regulatory scrutiny. For now, $LIBRA has to fight uphill to restore any kind of reputation and rebuild anything resembling market confidence, while the rest of us try to assess just how much risk we are facing by being involved in this token at all. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. Follow us on Twitter @nulltxnews to stay updated with the latest Crypto, NFT, AI, Cybersecurity, Distributed Computing, and Metaverse news ! title: Monad teams up with Orderly to bring Omnichain Liquidity to its L1 Blockchain: A New Era for DeFi?
body: Orderly Network, the decentralized trading infra and omni-chain liquidity provider, announced on Wednesday, the integration of its Omnichain liquidity infrastructure with Monad’s high-performance layer 1 Blockchain. Notably, the integration comes right after Monad made its public testnet live on Feb19. The collaboration aims to integrate Orderly’s deep liquidity solutions into the Monad ecosystem, offering decentralized exchanges (DEXs) and traders enhanced trading efficiency, lower latency, and improved capital efficiency. A New Era of Omnichain Liquidity? The partnership between Monad and Orderly Network comes at a pivotal moment for the DeFi landscape, where liquidity fragmentation remains a pressing challenge. Orderly Network’s omnichain liquidity solutions are designed to unify liquidity pools across multiple blockchains, enabling seamless asset transfers and reducing price inefficiencies in decentralized trading. By integrating with Monad, Orderly Network will help power a next-generation trading experience for DeFi users. Orderly Network, known for its order book model and deep liquidity capabilities, provides trading infrastructure that supports perpetual swaps, spot trading, and lending markets. By integrating into Monad’s ecosystem, Orderly brings institutional-grade liquidity to a blockchain that already boasts high throughput, low fees, and EVM compatibility. The Monad testnet will soon be available on these leading Orderly DEX's: @_WOOFi : https://t.co/gr38R14BZC @Bitoro_HQ : https://t.co/XUiNnmpbql @vooi_io : https://t.co/kYjZDUd087 @whatexchange : https://t.co/U2iKh84qjQ Join our discord to learn more: https://t.co/9aQLqGnvTT pic.twitter.com/F0N7b9C9Rl — Orderly (@OrderlyNetwork) February 19, 2025 What This Means for DeFi Traders and Developers The collaboration will empower DeFi developers building on Monad by offering access to: Deep On-Demand Liquidity: DEXs and DeFi protocols launching on Monad can instantly tap into Orderly’s liquidity pools, ensuring minimal slippage and enhanced price stability. Advanced Trading Infrastructure: The integration brings an order book model to Monad, giving traders access to features such as limit orders, perpetual swaps, and lending/borrowing mechanisms. Seamless Cross-Chain Interoperability: Traders will benefit from Orderly’s omnichain design, allowing assets to move efficiently between different blockchain ecosystems. Monad’s Growing Influence in the Web3 Space Monad has been gaining significant traction as a next-generation Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)-compatible blockchain. Unlike traditional EVM chains, Monad utilizes parallel execution to significantly enhance transaction throughput, aiming to rival the speeds of Solana while maintaining full Ethereum compatibility. This unique architecture makes it an attractive option for developers looking to scale Ethereum-based applications. The launch of Monad’s public testnet on February 19, 2025, has already drawn considerable interest from DeFi projects and Web3 developers eager to explore its capabilities. With the Orderly Network integration, Monad is further solidifying its position as a leading blockchain for decentralized finance. Over the coming months, Monad and Orderly Network will roll out multiple phases of their integration, including: Order Book Trading on Monad: DEXs will be able to leverage Orderly’s infrastructure for order book-based trading, an improvement over the traditional AMM model. Cross-Chain Liquidity Pools: Expanding liquidity access beyond Monad’s native ecosystem to interact with other major blockchains. Developer Incentives & Grants: Both projects are expected to launch incentive programs for developers building DeFi applications utilizing Orderly’s liquidity on Monad. The partnership between Monad and Orderly Network represents a milestone for DeFi innovation. By combining Monad’s high-performance execution environment with Orderly’s deep liquidity infrastructure, the collaboration is set to redefine omnichain trading and provide traders with an institutional-grade experience on a fully decentralized platform. As the DeFi space continues to evolve, integrations like these pave the way for a more interconnected and capital-efficient ecosystem, offering users and developers a seamless, high-performance trading experience across blockchain networks. The post Monad teams up with Orderly to bring Omnichain Liquidity to its L1 Blockchain: A New Era for DeFi? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Penny cryptos poised for growth: 3 potential millionaire maker tokens
body: Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only. Penny cryptos offer high earning potential, and ChowWow, TRON, and Cardano stand out as top picks for investors seeking the next big opportunity. Table of Contents Cardano: Talo integration sparks hope TRON: Staking activities spike ChowWow: Rewarding token holders via its staking platform Conclusion Cryptocurrencies have a large potential, and penny cryptos are considered to be among the most lucrative instruments for obtaining high revenues. They are relatively cheap and have a high earnings capacity, meaning that they can yield high returns and are suitable for those seeking the next big thing. There are quite a number of tokens in the market, but three stand out that could make investors millionaires: ChowWow (CHOW), TRON (TRX), and Cardano (ADA). All these cryptocurrencies have different characteristics that make them suited for progress in the next couple of years. But among them, ChowWow stands out due to its platform being incorporated with play to earn game and staking. As the presale is still active, there are many people rushing to invest heavily in the project by purchasing tokens in large quantities. Let’s take a look at what makes these three penny cryptos exceptional. Cardano: Talo integration sparks hope Cardano adopted EUTxO to provide higher scalability and, at the same time, increased security measures. That is a difference compared to account-based projects, including Ethereum. But, the model faced issues surrounding cost-efficient liquidity solutions and had liquidity inefficiencies, cyclic trading activities, and a lack of advanced trading platforms. That made ADA traders adopt manual strategies, CEXs or third-party bots. However, most solutions were expensive or came with information undisclosed, thus negatively affecting retail traders and smaller projects. Nevertheless, Talos has promised to fill the gap with advanced technology that relieves liquidity in the Cardano ecosystem. Talos integration aims to enable Cardano to have a different liquidity pool that will offer a better trading experience for institutional and retail investors. This will mean that the users will be able to access a tighter spread size, which will make holders of Cardano more optimistic about the project. TRON: Staking activities spike Tron’s USDT supply rose from $6.7 billion to $62 billion in 2021, painting the picture of stablecoin expansion. This is an indication of a gradual shift in the usage of stablecoins to attract more liquidity in crypto assets. Industry analysts pay increased attention to DeFi operations on TRON and other platforms as well. Due to the general bearish market, DeFi activities were slightly down this month as traders were not very active. The high sell pressure compounded the sentiments with assets loss, which was recorded in Q4 2024. In general, the majority of the networks have experienced an overall drop in the total value locked as well as a drastic drop in the trading volumes. The same is true for the TRON network, which decreased its TVL in the current trading environment. However, staking activities rose to new records, indicating that more people are transitioning to earn yield from their assets. You might also like: Surge predicted for ChowWow in 2025; CHOW aims to be leading SOL meme coin ChowWow: Rewarding token holders via its staking platform ChowWow is a meme coin that is popular for fast and cheap transactions and has a well-developed community support base. Unlike other meme tokens, the ChowWow token is built on the Solana network and stands out as a high-potential token and long-term investment project. Another factor contributing to the growth of ChowWow is its ability to incorporate a play-to-earn gaming system. These games are available to everyone; however, users cannot participate in P2E games and earn CHOW tokens if they do not own any of them. It is noteworthy that the portion of CHOW generated by in-game sales is added to the rewards pool and distributed among the game players, which is why it is the leading crypto project. Moreover, 10% of total tokens are devoted to gaming rewards, which can stabilize the game during its early phases. ChowWow has also integrated a stake-to-earn model that basically enables users to stake their CHOW for passive income. This way, users assist in enhancing the popular network and, at the same time, increase the liquidity so as to support the same. These new crypto staking rewards will depend on the quantity of crypto that has been staked and the period when staking is performed. Conclusion ChowWow, Cardano, and TRON are the leading penny cryptos to invest in the market now. But ChowWow is an exciting new crypto that is getting noticed by top investors. With its fast transactions, strong community, and promising technology, it is a promising crypto project. To learn more about ChowWow, visit the ChowWow presale. title: Metaplanet Doubles Down on Bitcoin with Ambitious Plans to Reach 21,000 BTC by 2026
body: A Japanese firm, Metaplanet, has been making waves with its aggressive investment strategy in Bitcoin , and it is now doubling down, amassing significant Bitcoin holdings in a move that seems to be a reaction to traditional market volatility. The company, which has made clear that this is only the starting point, held 1,300 BTC in June 2025. By the end of 2025, Metaplanet plans to hold 10,000 BTC, and by 2026, the company’s holdings will have, as promised, increased to 21,000 BTC. To put this in context, when the company hits that mark, it will hold approximately 0.1% of all Bitcoin in existence. Japanese firm Metaplanet has ramped up its Bitcoin holdings to 2,100 BTC, with plans to reach 21,000 by 2026. Their latest purchase: 68.59 BTC for $6.6M. They're clearly betting big on Bitcoin! From 97.85 to 2,100 BTC in 10 months. Targets 10,000 BTC by late 2025, 21,000 by… — Bitcoin.com News (@BTCTN) February 20, 2025 The most recent acquisition made by the company is a substantial one. They bought 68.59 BTC for $6.6 million. This purchase is not just any purchase, but an indicator of the company’s confidence in Bitcoin. They appear to see it as a store of value, much like gold, and they are betting that it could be a hedge against inflation. The pace at which they are accumulating Bitcoin is impressive. They now hold 2,100 BTC, which is 2,200% more than they had just 10 months ago. Strategic Bitcoin Accumulation: A Hedge Against Market Volatility Since April 2024, Metaplanet has had a Bitcoin-focused treasury strategy. It paid off. Following this, the firm’s stock price surged by more than 427%. This newfound confidence in the Metaplanet’s treasury strategy is palpable in the markets. While many firms have struggled to find ways to show accumulation of Bitcoin on their balance sheets, Metaplanet has seemed in some ways to be light years ahead. Accumulating Bitcoin through bonds and stock options rather than through traditional equity or other assets (on-balance sheet) has set them apart in terms of what appears to be a forward-thinking, risk-adjusted strategy. METAPLANET CONTINUES BITCOIN ACCUMULATION, PLANS TO HOLD 10,000 BTC BY YEAR END Metaplanet has expanded its bitcoin holdings with a new purchase of 68 BTC for $6.6 million, reinforcing its position as a major corporate bitcoin holder. The company now holds 2,100 BTC, securing… pic.twitter.com/v8hKrFaymq — IBC Group Official (@ibcgroupio) February 20, 2025 Long held up as “digital gold,” Bitcoin is gaining traction as an asset for public companies that want to guard against inflation, uncertain economic conditions, and the ups and downs of traditional markets. Inflation and geopolitical instability aren’t just affecting the U.S.; they’re hitting global markets. At times like these, an increasing number of firms are looking to Bitcoin as a non-correlated asset that might perform well when our usual investments—stocks, bonds, and the like—are under pressure. This trend is clear in Metaplanet’s strategy. The company is amassing Bitcoin as part of its portfolio and seems to be steering toward a not-so-distant future in which digital currency plays a larger role in the overall economy. Its leadership sees Bitcoin both as a modern equivalent of gold and as a hedge that could help offset the ups and downs of traditional financial markets. The Market’s Positive Response to Bitcoin Investment Rephrased Text: You can’t say enough about how the market has reacted positively to Metaplanet’s strategy of making Bitcoin the centerpiece of its treasury. Ever since the firm announced that it would be accumulating the cryptocurrency as part of its plan, its stock price has gone into overdrive, shooting up 427% and then some. So apparently, not only are Bitcoin itself and all the abstract and legal advantages of holding it making for a pretty sweet situation for Metaplanet, but the company also seems to be benefiting from a market perception that it’s somehow “forward-looking” for adding the digital currency to its treasury. The remarkable growth in stock price is not merely a consequence of Bitcoin’s soaring valuation, but also a reflection of investor enthusiasm regarding the company’s vision for its future. Clearly, investors have been favorably impressed by this bold decision to hitch the company’s fortunes to what is becoming recognized, in the wake of recent economic events, as an alternative asset class—one that XN may well have in its sights for risk management. And if Bitcoin really is on the cusp of becoming a valid asset class—to say nothing of the cash flow generation and the potential for an EPS ramp-up that might be ours to enjoy in fiscal 2015—then Metaplanet is ahead of the curve, gaining traction with both institutional and retail investors. Metaplanet’s Long-Term Vision for Bitcoin Holdings Metaplanet’s strategy for Bitcoin goes far beyond the 2,100 BTC it holds at present. The company has made its intentions indisputably clear: It plans to increase its BTC holdings significantly—and rapidly—over the next two years. Metaplanet has set sights on 10,000 BTC by late 2025 and a staggering 21,000 BTC by 2026. If realized, these lofty BTC targets will vault the venture outfit to a position among the largest Bitcoin holders in the world and, more importantly, among publicly traded entities. This vision is not just about amassing Bitcoin for growth. Metaplanet’s management sees Bitcoin as a key to long-term financial stability—something that no one can take for granted today, when the world is riddled with economic uncertainty, inflation, and geopolitical strife. By increasing its Bitcoin treasury, the company is not only betting on the future of “digital money,” as it calls Bitcoin, but also positioning itself as something of a lighthouse in the still murky waters of the cryptocurrency investment landscape. With Bitcoin gaining acceptance among the large companies of the world, the investment landscape is in for a shift. When those firms recognize and accumulate Bitcoin, they invariably help establish it as an asset class. Metaplanet’s strategy of voraciously accumulating Bitcoin is setting an exciting precedent. By using the cover of a diversified financial portfolio, this company is signaling to would-be followers that “embracing digital currencies” doesn’t have to be a line-in-the-sand kind of declaration. Conclusion: Metaplanet’s Bold Strategy Sets the Stage for Future Growth The Bitcoin investment strategy of Metaplanet has turned out well so far, with the firm’s stock price moving sharply upward, thanks to its maturing Bitcoin investment. Accumulating Bitcoin is Metaplanet’s focus, with plans to increase holdings to 10,000 BTC by 2025 and 21,000 BTC by 2026. The firm should be considered a major player in the cryptocurrency space. Using Bitcoin as a hedge against market volatility, Metaplanet is not just seizing the potential of digital currency but also leading the way for other public companies to do the same. Metaplanet has a long-term vision and a bold, clear, and almost reckless (in a good way) approach to an investment strategy focused on digital assets. Whatever happens to the price of Bitcoin in the short term, the move by Metaplanet and a growing number of similar companies makes this an exciting time to be involved with digital finance. title: Bitcoin Open Interest Climbs—Is a Market Breakout Around the Corner?
body: Bitcoin has gradually been recovering with its price now hovering above $97,000 as of today—a noticeable increase from the $94,000 price mark seen earlier this week This upward movement comes as analysts highlight significant trends in the perpetual futures markets that may indicate a substantial shift on the horizon. Related Reading: Bitcoin Ready For ‘Take Off’—Analyst Reveals Key Signals Bitcoin’s Open Interest Points to Possible Market Shift One notable development is the increase in Bitcoin’s open interest—an indicator of the total number of outstanding perpetual futures contracts on centralized exchanges. According to ShayanBTC, a CryptoQuant’s QuickTake platform contributor, Bitcoin’s open interest has been steadily rising despite recent market volatility. Shayan pointed out that this growth signals heightened activity within perpetual markets, which could lead to a decisive breakout in Bitcoin’s price. However, the direction of this move remains unclear as additional data is needed for a more precise forecast. Shayan noted: This increase suggests that more activity is flowing into the perpetual markets, and the dominant direction of these positions will ultimately determine Bitcoin’s next significant move. If this trend persists, the market will likely experience a major breakout in the mid-term. However, the direction of this move remains uncertain, as additional data is required to make an accurate prediction. Deep Learning Projections Offer Mixed Signals In a separate analysis, CryptoQuant’s analyst CryptoOnChain presented a data-driven projection of Bitcoin’s near-term price movements. By employing on-chain metrics and a deep learning model known as the Wave Net algorithm, CryptoOnChain estimated that Bitcoin’s price may fluctuate between $93,000 and $110,000 over the coming month. The chart below shows the prediction of Bitcoin’s price for the upcoming month using on-chain data and deep learning with the Wave Net algorithm. As observed, this prediction indicates a fluctuating pattern for the next month. #Bitcoin #BTC #CryptoTrading pic.twitter.com/4Ki8TYE8Ui — CryptoOnchain (@CryptoOnchain) February 19, 2025 Meanwhile, Bitcoin is still trading below $100,000 with a current trading price of $97,136, at the time of writing. While this market price has managed to put BTC’s daily performance in green, on a broader scale, BTC is still somewhat bearish. Over the past month, the asset has declined by 6.1% and its current trading price marks a 10.6% decrease away from its all-time high above $109,000 recorded last month. Related Reading: Is Bitcoin Showing Early Signs Of Bullish Divergence? Analyst Explains According to a Crypto analyst known as RektCapital on X, Bitcoin price action so far is “performing the key technical steps to fully confirm the Bull Flag breakout to set itself up for trend continuation going forward.” #BTC The Bitcoin post-breakout retest of the Monthly Bull Flag is successful thus far Price is performing the key technical steps to fully confirm the Bull Flag breakout so as to set itself up for trend continuation going forward ~$96700 needs to hold$BTC #Crypto #Bitcoin https://t.co/HXEsC7kN3p pic.twitter.com/OM6VCiUt5b — Rekt Capital (@rektcapital) February 20, 2025 Featured image created with DALL-E, Chart from TradingView

title: Smart Money Wallets Make Key Moves in AI, Wrapped Assets, and Memes: A Look at Recent Accumulations
body: The past 24 hours have seen the emergence of a new trend in the fast-changing world of cryptocurrencies : an influx of investment from smart money wallets. These are usually high-value wallets held by investors like institutions, whale traders, or early adopters. They often give us signals about market trends or about which projects have potential. In this latest wave of activity, they’ve been focused on a pretty diverse mix of narratives—from AI tech to wrapped assets to meme-inspired tokens. Key Areas of Smart Money Interest The smart wallets that accumulate these tokens do so with purpose and intent. They know what to buy, and they know what not to buy. That tells us that some or all of these three investment areas are likely to blow up, go parabolic, or at least be very good to those who invested in them. As for what exactly these smart wallets are buying, we can summarize things like this: Tokens related to AI and AI agents are getting bought up. Wrapped Bitcoin-related assets are getting bought up. And whatever’s unique or meme-based is getting bought up, too. AI and Blockchain: The Rise of $CLANKER and $HIBER One of the most striking accumulations has been in tokens driven by AI. Two projects, in particular, have stood out in the smart money wallet data: $CLANKER (TokenBot) and $HIBER (Hibernates). Both projects are making a big splash by combining AI with blockchain technology, and at this point, it’s worth considering what makes $CLANKER and $HIBER (and their respective teams) so interesting. In recent days, the attraction of the $CLANKER token, which uses both AI and blockchain, has reached new heights. Its appeal partly stems from the fact that it was recently listed on Coinbase, one of the major crypto exchanges. This sort of event tends to attract institutional investors, and indeed, we have seen some “smart money” wallets accumulating $CLANKER. Twelve of these wallets have a total of about $121,000 worth of tokens. At present, the $CLANKER market cap is around $63 million, and with the establishment of an ecosystem that is integrating AI bots, the project appears well positioned to be a cutting-edge contender for emerging in the space where AI and DeFi intersect. At the same time, $HIBER is advancing as the first robotics AI on the blockchain, backed by a promising team that boasts expertise from tech behemoths like Google and Amazon. This project has piqued the interest of four savvy crypto investors, who have collectively invested $47,000 and have acquired tokens in $HIBER. With a market cap of just $4 million, $HIBER is a low-cap opportunity for crypto investors to gain exposure to the potential of basing projects on the nascent blockchain. The team behind $HIBER, with its significant and relevant experience, adds a level of credibility to the project that makes it a prime candidate in AI investing for the Little Guy. Wrapped Assets: $WTRX Continues to Gain Momentum Investment in wrapped assets remains robust, and the use of AI-driven tokens is starting to be reflected in the investment community. Wrapped tokens are usually pegged to assets on other blockchains and allow these assets to be used in DeFi (decentralized finance) applications. One pegged to TRON (the native token of the blockchain of the same name), $WTRX (wrapped TRX), has been accumulating steady support from smart money wallets. The last 24 hours have seen two wallets invest a total of $70,000 into $WTRX, pushing the current market cap of the token to around $405 million. Part of what makes $WTRX interesting is the token’s recent explosion in transaction volume on platforms like SunSwap. This could indicate that decentralized trading of TRX is becoming more common, and this trend could really play into the hands of $WTRX as a DeFi token. Furthermore, with cross-chain liquidity becoming a bigger issue, $WTRX could really be poised for a breakout as a “smart money” token. Smart money wallets accumulations in the last 24 hours Main specific narratives accumulated: AI and AI Agents (21 wallets) Wrapped BTC and related (5 wallets) MEME and unique narratives (8 wallets) Top accumulations and reasoning: $CLANKER (tokenbot) ->… pic.twitter.com/MsBUG2Ikkh — CoinSense.app (@CoinSense_App) February 20, 2025 Meme Coins: From Fart Girl to Broccoli Even though the market has been dominated by more traditional tech and finance-driven projects, the meme coin phenomenon remains alive and well. Community-driven tokens often tied to inside jokes or internet memes are still attracting a lot of public attention. One good example of this is $FARTGIRL, part of the increasingly popular “Fart meme series.” This token is starting to make a name for itself, thanks to some dedicated community events and a good amount of online hype. One savvy wallet, however, has now picked up to the tune of $43,000 worth of $FARTGIRL. Considering the token’s market cap is $7 million, this is probably a suspect buying event. Still, considering how irrationally these things trade on hype, who knows? A project drawing inspiration from memes that is currently getting attention is $Broccoli, a coin inspired by CZ’s (Binance CEO) dog. $Broccoli has already bagged multiple exchange listings and has developed a solid community following. Two smart wallets have picked up a combined $32,000 worth of the token, which has a current market cap of $49 million. With a mostly unfounded community backing and meme potential, $Broccoli is a clear outlier in the meme coin klepto portfolio. Conclusion Current allocations by smart money into crypto wallets suggest an increasing variety of the kinds of projects that grab their attention. We see this in the clear concentration of interest on the part of such sophisticated investors in artificial intelligence and blockchain technologies. Projects like $CLANKER and $HIBER seem to them to promise both innovation and market growth. Meanwhile, wrapped assets—especially $WTRX—enjoy what can only be described as a DeFi-fueled upswing. This dramatic rise offers a platform on which to build cross-chain applications. Finally, we are a long way from the days in which serious crypto folks only half-jokingly considered Bitcoin “the next internet.” Meme coins may seem a bit strange. But in both $FARTGIRL’s and $Broccoli’s cases, we see a strong community and real potential behind what can only be described as unusual projects. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. title: Bitcoin Still in the Early Stages of a Bull Market, Says BTC Veteran Adam Back – Here’s His Outlook
body: Blockstream CEO Adam Back says that Bitcoin ( BTC ) is still in the early stages of the current bull market as the adoption of the flagship crypto asset mounts. In a new interview with CNBC, Back says that Bitcoin’s buying demand remains high across various investing segments, including exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and that the bull market is far from over. “I think we’re certainly in the early stages of the bull market at this point. You know, typically the bull market cycle lasts for a certain period after the halving, and so we’re still in the early innings. I think there are very stiff inflows from ETFs buying about two times the Bitcoin mined per day, MicroStrategy and the other Bitcoin treasury companies buying another two times, and the retail buyers and dollar-cost-average investors. So really, that’s a lot of inflow.” Back predicts Bitcoin will soon start printing a series of rallies and may see an explosive breakout if governments start adopting Bitcoin strategic reserves. “I think temporarily there’s some consolidation, because some earlier investors, sort of mid-term investors’ profit taking. But that overlay would set us up for a price where you start to see Bitcoin competing with gold, perhaps pulling money out of gold ETFs, into Bitcoin, ETFs. And then, of course, if the treasuries come in, like the sovereign treasuries, the Bitcoin reserves, that would be something where you’d see sovereign competition, as soon as one of the bigger countries jumps in, I think the others will feel forced to follow suit, so all bets will be off if that happens… I think there’s a lot more capital in the institutional space of pension funds and mutual funds. So there’s a lot of room for capital to come in in this cycle.” Bitcoin is trading for $98,247 at time of writing, up 1.4% in the last 24 hours. ? title: Bitcoin Faces Crucial Crossroads Amid Declining Capital Inflows and Rising Open Interest
body: The cryptocurrency market has shifted dramatically, with capital outflows taking the spotlight over the past week. A huge $13.50 billion has come out of the market, and it certainly has the appearance of an “outlaw” (indeed, a significant loosening of the reins seems to have sparked at least partially this past week’s exodus from the banking sector). It makes us wonder whether a middle-ground/compromise scenario with sufficient regulatory clarity (especially on U.S. soil) can actually come to pass, and if it does, whether it will do so soon enough to avoid the appearance of a withering Bitcoin ecosystem. $BTC open interest is on the rise, showing increased activity in perpetual futures markets. Despite price fluctuations, this trend suggests a major breakout could be on the horizon. The big question—will bullish momentum take over, or are bears about to step in? More data is… pic.twitter.com/bZ7bqcxm6S — Kyledoops (@kyledoops) February 20, 2025 Bitcoin’s Price Action and Key Technical Indicators Bitcoin’s price has reached a critical moment after a recent rebound. The $BTC market has been pulling back as of late, with the TD Sequential indicator flashing a sell signal on the 4-hour chart. This suggests that Bitcoin might be setting up for a short-term retracement, with the recent upward momentum possibly coming to an end. The TD Sequential, a popular technical analysis tool, is often used to predict when price trends are running out of gas and might be reversing. This signal adds to the general uncertainty in the market, with traders questioning whether the recent surge was just a brief rally before further consolidation or the head fake it seems to be at times. #Bitcoin $BTC may be setting up for a pullback, as the TD Sequential indicator flashes a sell signal on the 4-hour chart following the recent rebound! pic.twitter.com/HCCDb4uFNh — Ali (@ali_charts) February 20, 2025 Even so, the resistance level most vital for monitoring Bitcoin is still at $97,533. This price point is seen as the threshold that will determine at least for the time being whether Bitcoin has the necessary push to move higher or whether it is going to have to work very hard just to maintain the upward trajectory that could be called bullish. Something that could happen and that many analysts would like to see happen would be a sustained breakout above this critical resistance level, an event that might just propel Bitcoin towards its next leg of bullish price action. The most critical resistance level for #Bitcoin $BTC is currently at $97,533! A sustained breakout above this level could signal further upside. pic.twitter.com/Fh8qIUtvZJ — Ali (@ali_charts) February 20, 2025 Rising Open Interest: A Sign of Increased Market Activity Amid these price fluctuations, one remarkable phenomenon is the growing open interest in Bitcoin’s perpetual futures markets. Open interest means the outstanding derivative contracts that have not yet been settled—our compound future capital price indicator. Open interest growth signals an increase in market activity and liquidity, and we take it as saying capital is coming into the Bitcoin futures markets. Moreover, we infer from the rising open interest that traders are taking larger positions and are expecting a big price move sometime soon. The increase in open interest combined with price fluctuations indicates that a significant breakout or breakdown is coming. Traders are positioning themselves for volatility, and Bitcoin’s approaching critical technical levels is likely to increase the swings the market will take. There are two other factors to consider. The increasing activity in the futures market seems to point toward not just more volatility but more substantial price moves in either direction—more price discovery as they say—which also tends to be an ingredient in the short-term recipe for big upward or downward price moves that they serve to traders. Capital Outflows: Bearish Sentiment Creeps In A recent development that should concern Bitcoin investors is the outflow of capital from Bitcoin-related financial products. Recently, the products saw a net outflow of $71.07 million. This number is concerning because it emphasizes a recent development: We seem to have gone from a period of relatively stable inflows of institutional capital into the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency markets to a period of relatively stable outflows. This stable outflow period emphasizes two key concerns that I have about the current state of Bitcoin’s price, which I will cover in the next two sections. On February 19, the total net outflow of Bitcoin spot ETF was 71.0709 million US dollars. The total net inflow of Ethereum spot ETF was 19.0192 million US dollars, and the net inflow continued for 4 days. https://t.co/Tvs2oCS03I — Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) February 20, 2025 The broader cryptocurrency market has seen an exit of $13.50 billion in capital over the past week, and this is further highlighting the sentiment shift. As this market sees an exit of capital and a slowdown in new inflows, it gives the appearance of a Bitcoin cooling-off period. Without substantial buying pressure, which seems less likely with a slowdown in capital inflows, Bitcoin is now positioned against something even worse than a return to the resilience of the 786 Fib level: stagnation. $13.50 billion has left the cryptocurrency market in the past week, signaling a decline in capital inflows. pic.twitter.com/oZSzuSKEOo — Ali (@ali_charts) February 20, 2025 The Big Question: Bulls or Bears? While Bitcoin receives these contradicting signals, the fundamental question every trader seems to be asking is whether Bitcoin is still on a bullish trajectory or if the bears are about to take over. What happens next really seems to hinge on how Bitcoin deals with the $97,533 resistance level. A clear move to the upside past this threshold could very well reignite the bullish narrative and have traders looking for new highs in the very near future. A failure to do the same could have the opposite effect and really could have the market looking for a deeper pullback in the Bitcoin price. Open interest is up. Even with Bitcoin down around 2% today, traders are holding out hope, and many of them are still in it for a significant price move—either up or down. And the way open interest is rising, you could even say the market seems primed for a volatility explosion—suggesting some traders might want to be on alert for BTC breakouts or breakdowns in the coming days. Of course, as Bitcoin moves, potential inflow and outflow from the BTC ETFs could also cause volatility, unless they just change the direction in which inflow or outflow is going. Conclusion At this pivotal moment, many key elements exert an influence on the future price of Bitcoin. A hefty $13.50 billion has exited the cryptocurrency market, and the open interest in Bitcoin futures has been rising, which is a setup that often leads to turbulence. Yet, with these outflows and the open interest leading to turbulence, Bitcoin’s nominal price is not leading to a crisis atmosphere, with the digital currency still holding above the support at $30,000. Because it is also hovering beneath the necessary breakout point of $37,000, market participants are eying any developments in the turbulence between bulls and bears. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services.
